167 
 
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  UTME SUBJECTS  SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
     UTME  
(i) KSU requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in English 
Language, Arabic and three (3) other relevant 
subjects.  
  
ARABIC AND IS  
YOSU  
 EKSU    
Two (2) 'A' level passes 
in relevant subjects.  
Same as in Arabic Studies  
  
Studies  
  
Same as in Arabic  DIRECT ENTRY  
(i)  EKSU accepts two (2) 'A' level passes in Arabic/IS 
and one (1) Arts subject plus the UTME 
requirements  
  
UTME  
(i) EKSU requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes to include 
English Language and other Arts subjects and 'O' 
level pass in Mathematics at one (1) sitting.  
  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
 (i)  EKSU requires Arts subjects  
  
  
  
  
ARCHAEOLOGY  
 ABU          
IBADAN:                 
with options in: Geography, 
Zoology, Botany, Geology,  
History,  Classics,  Religious  
Studies  
JOS  
 UNN    
Two (2) ‘A’ level passes 
in Arts or Social 
Sciences and one (1) 
Science subject.  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes to 
include English Language 
and one (1) of the following 
subjects, Religious Studies, 
Geography, Economics and 
History.  
  
Any two (2) 
subjects from Arts, 
Social Sciences and 
one (1) of History, 
Religious Studies, 
Government and 
Geography.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) ABU accepts  
a) two (2) ‘A’ level passes in Science/Arts/Social 
Sciences at IJMB/NCE.  
b) General English/Use of English, NCE sa tisfies 
the ‘O’ level English Language requirement.  
(ii) IBADAN accepts 'A' level passes in any two (2) Arts 
subjects.   
(iii) JOS accepts NCE Merit or ND lower credit.  
(iv) UNN requires   
a) two (2) 'A' level passes or ND/HNDcreditor  
NCE merit plus the UTME requirements
